languages.text: "Страдания?! Их камни душ разбиты, Ссиртан, и Та, Что Жаждет давно закончила пир! Мы уничтожим их. Каждого мон-кай, что... Ты это слышал?"
"Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"
languages.original_text: "Страдания?! Их камни душ разбиты, Ссиртан, и Та, Что Жаждет давно закончила пир! Мы уничтожим их. Каждого мон-кай, что... Ты это слышал?"

traits.locale_text: "Suffering? Their Spirit Stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— Did you hear that?"
"Suffering? Their Spirit Stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— Did you hear that?"
"Suffering? Their Spirit Stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— Did you hear that?"
"Suffering? Their Spirit Stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— Did you hear that?"
"Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"
"Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

languages.text: “痛苦？他们的灵魂石已经碎了，西撒坦，饥渴女士早就结束了她的盛宴！我们要杀光他们，不要放过一只猴——等等，你听到了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: “痛苦？他们的灵魂石已经碎了，西撒坦，饥渴女士早就结束了她的盛宴！我们要杀光他们，不要放过一只猴——等等，你听到了吗？”

languages.text: "Leid? Ihre Seelensteine sind zertrümmert, Ssirtan, und Sie, die dürstet, hat ihr Festmahl längst beendet! Wir werden sie vernichten. Jeden Chem-Pan-Sey, d- Habt Ihr das gehört?"
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: "Leid? Ihre Seelensteine sind zertrümmert, Ssirtan, und Sie, die dürstet, hat ihr Festmahl längst beendet! Wir werden sie vernichten. Jeden Chem-Pan-Sey, d- Habt Ihr das gehört?"

languages.text: «¿Sufrimiento? ¡Sus joyas espirituales están rotas, Ssirtan; ya hace mucho que la Sedienta se dio un festín con sus almas! Los destruiremos. A todos los mon-keigh que han... Espera, ¿qué ha sido eso?».
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sufrimiento? ¡Sus joyas espirituales están rotas, Ssirtan; ya hace mucho que la Sedienta se dio un festín con sus almas! Los destruiremos. A todos los mon-keigh que han... Espera, ¿qué ha sido eso?».

languages.text: « Leurs souffrances ? Leurs pierres-esprits sont en miettes, Ssirtan, et l'Assoiffée a fini son festin depuis longtemps déjà ! Nous les anéantirons. Tous les mon-keigh qui... Vous avez entendu ça ? »
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: « Leurs souffrances ? Leurs pierres-esprits sont en miettes, Ssirtan, et l'Assoiffée a fini son festin depuis longtemps déjà ! Nous les anéantirons. Tous les mon-keigh qui... Vous avez entendu ça ? »

languages.text: 「苦しむ？彼らの魂縛石は砕け散り、サールタンとかの渇きたる女が宴を終えて久しい！我々は彼らを滅ぼす。全てのモン＝ケイ…聞こえたか？」
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: 「苦しむ？彼らの魂縛石は砕け散り、サールタンとかの渇きたる女が宴を終えて久しい！我々は彼らを滅ぼす。全てのモン＝ケイ…聞こえたか？」

languages.text: "Acı mı? Ruh taşları çatlamış Ssirtan. Susayan'sa ziyafetini çoktan bitirmiş! Onları yok edeceğiz! Parmağı olan tüm mon-keighler... Sen de duydun mu?"
languages.original_text: "Suffering? Their spirit stones are shattered, Ssirtan, and She Who Thirsts has long finished her feast! We will destroy them. Every mon-keigh who— did you hear that?"

traits.locale_text: "Acı mı? Ruh taşları çatlamış Ssirtan. Susayansa ziyafetini çoktan bitirmiş! Onları yok edeceğiz! Parmağı olan tüm mon-keighler... Sen de duydun mu?"
